official_title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to extend for one fiscal year the programs of assistance under that act.

summary.text: Extends for one fiscal year the programs of assistance under the Community Mental Health Centers Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to extend for one fiscal year the programs of assistance under that act.
